title: Cold Calling - Appointment Setter (Fluent English) | Full-Time + Bonuses | EST Hours
job_overview:
We are a growing U.S.-based digital marketing agency looking for a confident Appointment Setter / Sales Virtual Assistant to join our team full-time.

In this role, you will:
- Call U.S.-based small businesses (dentists, med spas, contractors)
- Use proven scripts to introduce our reputation management services
- Book qualified appointments for our senior sales team
- Log notes and follow-ups in our CRM (GoHighLevel)
- Follow up via SMS or email when needed

About You:
- Excellent spoken English with a friendly, professional tone
- Minimum 1 year of cold calling or appointment setting experience
- Comfortable making outbound calls to warm and cold prospects
- Reliable internet connection and quiet work environment
- Tech-savvy (experience with CRMs, spreadsheets, dialers)
- Self-motivated, proactive, and eager to grow

What We Offer:
- Competitive base salary $600–$900/month (depending on experience)
-  Performance bonuses (up to $300/month extra for hitting targets)
-  Paid training and clear scripts to set you up for success
-  Supportive team culture and weekly coaching sessions
-  Opportunity to grow into a Team Lead or Sales Manager role
-  Full-time, long-term position (U.S. EST hours)

Working Hours:
8:00 AM – 5:00 PM EST (night shift PH time)
